bit.name: uses simple wind
bit.tooltip: The wind on this point won't have high-frequency variations.

bit.name: uses damped wind
bit.tooltip: The wind on this point will be artificially slow.

bit.name: no gravity
bit.tooltip: The point is not affected by gravity.

value.name: surface friction
value.tooltip: When hitting the ground or interior, percentage of velocity lost in one collision.

value.name: elasticity
value.tooltip: 0.0 is inelastic collisions (no bounce) 1.0 is perfectly elastic (reflected velocity equals incoming velocity).
